t: Do Amazon products have the same good quality as shown in the Amazon app or website or there may be some difference? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Regardless of the platform you choose to shop online with Amazon the products are all from the same sources. However you asked about good quality so I’ll add the following. Always check that the seller has a return policy. 98.7% do but the few that do not are selling crap.

t: Amazon's New Brand Store Quality Rating: What It Means for You

This tool provides valuable insights into how your Brand Store performs compared to others, along with personalized tips on how to make it even better.
